data.title: CONTENTdm
data.meta_description: Italy's King Victor and Queen Elena arrive in state to visit Pope Pius XI at the Vatican. Scenes include royalty getting out of cars and entering the building, the procession and reception of papal guards within the halls, and the royal visitors (King, Queen, Prince Humbert, Princess Maria, and Princess Giovanna). Long-distance shots include a view of St. Peter's Square and various scenes of the royal procession on the steps and entering/exiting the papal suites. Swiss guard escorts in full costume appear throughout.
